Translations.Text: Tamen shengqian suo fan de zui'e, ye jiang dui tamen xianxian chulai; tamen shengqian suo chaoxiao de xingfa, jiang lailin tamen
Ren zao huannan shi, jiu qidao wo; yidan wo ba wo de enhui shangci ta, ta bian shuo:“Wo huode zhe enhui, zhi yin wo you teshu de zhishi bale.” Buran! Na shi yi zhong shiyan, dan tamen daban buzhidao
Zai tamen zhiqian de ren, que yi shuoguo zheyang dehuale; dan tamen suo huo de caichan, duiyu tamen meiyou biyi
gu tamen yi zaoshou ziji suo gan de zui'e de guobao. Zhexie ren zhong bu yi de renmen, jiang zaoshou ziji suo gan de zui'e de guobao, tamen jue buneng taobi tianqian
Nandao tamen hai bu zhidao ma? Zhenzhu yu shi shei de jiyang kuanyu, jiu shi ta kuanyu; yu shi shei de jiyang jiongpo, jiu shi ta jiongpo. Duiyu xindao de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.§
Ni shuo:“Wo de guofen zihai de zhong pu ya! Nimen dui zhenzhu de enhui buyao juewang, zhenzhu biding she you yiqie zuiguo, ta que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de
Zai xingfa lailin nimen, er nimen bu huo yuanzhu yiqian, nimen dang guiyi nimen de zhu
Zai xingfa bu zhi bu jue de huran jianglin nimen yiqian, nimen yingdang zuncong nimen de zhu jiang shi nimen de zuimei de xun ci.”
Yimian renhe ren shuo:“Wuhu tong zai! Wo yi daimanle dui zhenzhu ying jin de yiwu, wo que shi chaonong zhe.”
